'''Horse''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
=== Entities ===
* {{EntityLink|Horse}} – A mob that can be equipped with a [[saddle]] and [[horse armor]].
* {{EntityLink|Skeleton Horse}} – A mob that can be spawned in [[skeleton trap]]s and can equipped with saddles.
* {{EntityLink|Zombie Horse}} – An zombie variant of the horse, which can equipped with saddles.
* {{EntityLink|Donkey}} – A mob that can equipped with saddles and [[chest]]s.
* {{EntityLink|Mule}} – An offspring of a [[horse]] and [[donkey]], which can equipped with saddles and chests.

=== Items ===
* {{ItemLink|Horse Armor}} - A armor that can be ridded by horses. Leather horse armor can be colored.

=== Updates ===
* [[Horse Update]]

=== Capes ===
* {{PersonaLink|Zombie Horse Cape}}

=== Removed ===
* {{ItemLink|Horse Saddle}} - A removed feature, which was replaced by [[saddle]]s.

=== Jokes ===
* {{EntityLink|Cow Horse|Cow Horse}} - A joke feature from [[Java Edition 2.0|April Fools 2013]].
* {{EntityLink|Pony|Pony or Horse Pig}} - A joke feature from [[Java Edition 2.0|April fools 2013]].

=== Tutorials ===
* [[Tutorial:Horses|Horses]]

== ''Minecraft Dungeons'' ==

* {{DuEntityLink|Skeleton Horseman}} - A [[MCD:Powerful|powerful]] mob consisting of a [[MCD:Armored Skeleton|armored skeleton]] riding a skeleton horse.
